summary: Created CLAUDE.md with comprehensive project-specific instructions for Claude Code integration, including project context, coding conventions, architectural decisions, and common tasks.
key_changes: Added project overview explaining 100minds MCP server philosophy and architecture
Documented Rust coding conventions and allowed Clippy lints
Outlined key architectural decisions (adversarial debate, learning flywheel, provenance)
Listed common development tasks and integration patterns
Included file structure and security/performance notes
assumptions: CLAUDE.md did not previously exist in the project
Content based on analysis of lib.rs, main.rs, and other source files
Follows Rust best practices and project-specific patterns
